name: Seven for a Secret
description:
Guide through a cave a small raft guided by a bird. But beware of the creatures of the profundities, they will try to steal your raft.

Try not to run out of space, and follow your compass.

CONTROLS OVERVIEW:

WASD----------------------------------------- (move)
Space on a border(holding) + WAS (holding)--- (row)

N-------------------------------------------- attack
M-------------------------------------------- attach new planks to the raft

------

A game by @atcolombini, @davidaguado42, @gotomakethehand, @irenealfaro, @AlbaRiCoque & @alexbenet

Small game for Ludum Dare JAM 42.
